title: Machine Monitoring System
shortDescription: A Windows Forms application for monitoring machine status and tracking maintenance activities.
longDescription: In this application, I created a Windows Forms application for monitoring machine status and tracking maintenance activities. The application allows users to add, edit, and delete machines, as well as track their maintenance history. The application also allows users to generate reports on machine status and maintenance activities.
keyFeatures: Generate reports on machine status and maintenance activities
Responsive design for different screen sizes
challenges: Implementing a responsive design for different screen sizes
keyLearnings: Responsive design for different screen sizes
